title: Save BIG on these TCL TVs ahead of the holiday season!
description: TCL has announced some pretty amazing discounts for its TVs ahead of the holiday season, so check out these deals and save big! The post Save BIG on these TCL TVs ahead of the holiday season! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Tyler Lee
excerpt: TCL has announced some pretty amazing discounts for its TVs ahead of the holiday season, so check out these deals and save big!
text: A lot of us imagine what it would be like to have a massive TV sitting in our living rooms. While the prices of big-screened TVs have dropped over the years, obviously the larger the TV, the more expensive it gets. Luckily for you, TCL is running a sale for its smart TVs ahead of the holiday season, so check out these deals below if you want to save yourself some money! TCL 98″ Q Class 4K UHD HDR QLED Smart TV Starting with the 98-inch TCL Q6 TV, the company has announced that for a limited time only, they are offering it at a 47% discount. This brings the price of the TV down to a mere $1,599. We know that it still isn’t cheap per se, but compared to competing brands and considering what you’ll be getting, it’s an outright steal. The TCL Q6 is a smart TV with support for Google TV. This means that you’ll be able to download and access a bunch of apps, including those made by your favorite streaming service. The Q6 features the use of a QLED PRO Quantum Dot display. It boasts a 4K resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate. It supports HDR PRO+ with Dolby Vision, HDR10+, HDR10, and HLG. There’s support for Dolby Atmos Audio, DTS Virtual:X, a built-in subwoofer, and support for Bluetooth connectivity. It also works with various digital assistants and smart home platforms like Alexa, Google Assistant, and Apple’s HomeKit. TCL 98″ Q Class 4K UHD HDR QD-Mini LED Smart TV Next up, we have the 98-inch TCL QM7. We’re not going to lie, this will cost you more. However, as part of TCL’s early Black Friday sales, this TV is enjoying a 54% discount which brings it down to $2,299. It’s not cheap, but looking at its specs, features, and size, it’s not a bad TV deal. The TCL QM7 features a 4K resolution and relies on QD-Mini LED display technology. It has an Ultra LED backlight that helps boost the brightness of the display, and it also comes with a 120Hz refresh rate to ensure that buttery smooth experience, whether you’re watching movies or playing games. Similar to the Q6, there’s support for HDR Ultra with Dolby Vision, HDR10+, HDR10, and HLG. There’s a built-in game accelerator with support for AMD FreeSync Premium Pro, so if you plan to hook up a console to the TV, you should have a fantastic gaming experience. Especially when combined with Dolby Atmos Audio and DTS Virtual:X. The QM7 comes with Google TV and Chromecast built-in, along with Apple’s AirPlay 2, so casting content from your phone, tablet, or laptop shouldn’t be an issue.
